kvs.page-description: Any individual holding Fair tokens is automatically a member of Fair DAO. If you have spare time, you can also participate in the development and operation of the Fair DAO project.

worker-items.name: Join Fair DAO
worker-items.des: You automatically become a member of the Fair DAO organization by holding Fair tokens.

worker-items.name: Obtain Fair Tokens
worker-items.des: Purchase through the SunPump launch platform or request them from existing holders.

worker-items.name: Contribute to Development & Operations
worker-items.des: If you are a programmer, UI designer, translator, etc., we welcome your participation in the development and operation of the Fair DAO project.
